body:
Hey guys, how's everyone doing? :D 

AMA I guess, I thought It'd be nice to pop into the forums since It's been so long

I've not been on Minecraft in coming up to a year now, I am only active on Steam now where I have made many new friends :3

-HotCamTheMan / MonsieurStar / FlufflesSub as you guys know me <3

title: It's been a year... AMA

replies.body: HI MR MAP DEV

replies.body:
I'll break the choo choo train and ask a dead serious question ;) Put some thought pls ;]

Since you are Minecraft free, has your attitude on life changed? Do you believe that you gained skills from this game that you have used outside of life in school, jobs if you have/had one?

Nice to see you back again :) You were a legend back in the day xd
replies.body_tagged:
I'll break the choo choo train and ask a dead serious question ;) Put some thought pls ;]

Since you are Minecraft free, has your attitude on life changed? Do you believe that you gained skills from this game that you have used outside of life in school, jobs if you have/had one?

Nice to see you back again :) You were a legend back in the day xd

replies.body: @seth Hey :D Still don't have your own skype? (answer 2 ur question in spoooooookehsss)<br id="null"><br id="null">@Spoookeh Absolutely brilliant man, I have a job, a provisional license to ride a motorbike and soon I'll receive my business licence to sell my spraypaints/ perform on the street :3 It's been looking up aha, I've made quite a few new friends in steam, I'm an admin on a new community and overall a happier person :P The only thing that brings me down is school cause I SUCK at it D: Maybe one day I'll make one last map, one day...<br id="null"><br id="null">@MLGtino hey man how's it going? :)<br id="null">@ryiley HI MR RILO <br id="null"><br id="null">@vlad Nice to see you too man, you have a steam? My attitude on life is quite different since then, I believe I have turned a new page, however, I still remember the skills that I learnt, Avicus taught me how to communicate in a team effectively, I use that to this day, and the creativity from building maps, I find it easier to tune in to myself and use this to my advantage <3 vlad you are still a legend fam  <br id="null">
replies.body_tagged: @seth Hey :D Still don't have your own skype? (answer 2 ur question in spoooooookehsss)<br id="null"><br id="null">@Spoookeh Absolutely brilliant man, I have a job, a provisional license to ride a motorbike and soon I'll receive my business licence to sell my spraypaints/ perform on the street :3 It's been looking up aha, I've made quite a few new friends in steam, I'm an admin on a new community and overall a happier person :P The only thing that brings me down is school cause I SUCK at it D: Maybe one day I'll make one last map, one day...<br id="null"><br id="null">@MLGtino hey man how's it going? :)<br id="null">@ryiley HI MR RILO <br id="null"><br id="null">@vlad Nice to see you too man, you have a steam? My attitude on life is quite different since then, I believe I have turned a new page, however, I still remember the skills that I learnt, Avicus taught me how to communicate in a team effectively, I use that to this day, and the creativity from building maps, I find it easier to tune in to myself and use this to my advantage <3 vlad you are still a legend fam  <br id="null">

@DaFrozenBlaze life's good man :P I doubt I will play again, unless I make one final parting gift map :3

@AWESOMERP chips :^) 
@crimson elephants can't fly because the laws of physics said so, doesn't mean we can't imagine it though am I right? :D loudspeakers for bass, headphones for eargasms. I'd throw a flying elephant at a it :3

replies.body:
Hey there, dude.
It's nice to see you're doing well.
You know, I've been meaning to apologize to you.
For everything that does not need to be readdressed once again.
I hope no more ill-will burdens our shoulders anymore.
Either way, I'm glad you're thriving in life.
Best of luck, Snow.
replies.body_tagged:

Either way, I'm glad you're thriving in life.
